Package camzup.pfriendly

Class ZSurfaceAwt

java.lang.Object
processing.core.PSurfaceNone
camzup.pfriendly.ZSurfaceAwt
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PSurface
public class ZSurfaceAwt
extends processing.core.PSurfaceNone
An AWT-backed surface manually ported from Processing 4 alpha to fix bugs with setIcon and mouseReleased. This surface is generated by the YupJ2 renderer.

    • awtToProcessingMouseButton

      public static int awtToProcessingMouseButton​(int button)
      Converts an AWT mouse button, such as MouseEvent.BUTTON1, to a Processing mouse button. For use in cases where a mouse is released or clicked, and the AWT masking method doesn't properly recognize which button.
      Parameters:
      button - the AWT button
      Returns:
      the Processing button
